Summary: Came home with future brother in law on property in the mountain I bought-
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and Charlie came home from Helena after going out to eat and shopping for what we would be eating for breakfast the next day.We pulled up the driveway which is at end of the road were I live in the summer.We were in the car and we saw a light just over the trees off to the right,the trees are about 70 feet tall. We watched it as it was slowly going away from us it stayed at the same distence above the trees but was more to the open side of the property it just slowly was moving and all of a sudden it was as if the light went off and we couldn,t see it anymore.It just turn the light off.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lincoln
This sighting has never been favorited.
